name: Hyperthread Demo [OST Jam Vol 2]
description:
Weave your shots through the enemy's shields and strike them down.

Mixing fast-paced roguelike progression with incremental game mechanics (like Cookie Clicker or AdVenture Capitalist), this game requires quick reflexes and the ability to multitask to build a reserve of resources and also defeat the enemy before time runs out.

Made for the OST Jam Vol 2 in April 2021.

Music used:
  • GARDNSOUND - 90 TEEN
  • Milau - Harmonic Disorder
  • Track -  Orbital Entanglement
Inspiration:
  • SWORDSHOT by Oleg Klaus
  • SPACEPLAN by Jake Hollands
